page.title: 20CLOSING CREDITS
page.content:
Class 1{Debden C.of E. Primary {School's}thoughts on the Domesday Project;- "when we first heard about it we didn't think it would be very interesting but it was good fun..." In{June 1985}Class 1 consisted of Nicholas Auger Rowan Hasson Nicholas Simmonds Gary Watson Hilary Crane Lucy Cunningham Frances Manser Jocelyn Miles Lisa Ryan Lisa Vaughan Nicola Woolner Portia Wright Dawn Bontoft Thomas Ellis Douglas Smith Joanne Davies Natasha Gillions Sarah Griffin
.....and their teacher Mrs G. Hartley. Thanks are due to Mrs C. Bucknell who interpreted the notes,and Richard Hartley who typed these into the computer.
